steps.en: Day 1: Go to bed at the same time tonight. Try to keep a fixed sleep schedule.
steps.ur: Din 1: Aaj raat aik hi waqt par soyen. Koshish karein ke neend ka waqat muqarrar ho.

steps.en: Day 2: Avoid caffeine after 6 PM to improve sleep quality.
steps.ur: Din 2: 6 bajay ke baad caffeine (chai/coffee) se parhez karein taake neend behtar ho.

steps.en: Day 3: Dim the lights 1 hour before bed to signal your body to rest.
steps.ur: Din 3: Sone se 1 ghanta pehle roshni kam karein, jis se jism ko araam ka ishara mile.

steps.en: Day 4: Do light stretching or deep breathing before sleep.
steps.ur: Din 4: Sone se pehle halki stretching ya gehri saans lein.

steps.en: Day 5: Keep your phone away from bed. Reduce screen time before sleep.
steps.ur: Din 5: Mobile phone ko bistar se door rakhein. Sone se pehle screen time kam karein.

steps.en: Day 6: Write down your thoughts in a small journal before bed.
steps.ur: Din 6: Sone se pehle apne khayalat aik chhoti diary mein likh lein.

steps.en: Day 7: Reflect on your week. Which practice helped you the most?
steps.ur: Din 7: Apne haftay ka jaiza lein. Konsi aadat ne sab se zyada madad ki?
